name: Unlikely AI
slogan: Product-centric and contrarian advancement of Artificial Intelligence
description: Much of what we are working on is still under the radar. An early product is a cryptic crossword solving app called Crossword Genius that can solve and explain cryptic crossword clues. The technology behind app is a test bed for some ideas around AI which we are advancing in other products.

team.title: Founder and CEO
team.name: William Tunstall-Pedoe
team.bioHtml: Founder of Evi (formerly True Knowledge) which was acquired by Amazon in 2012 and where I then built and launched Echo and Alexa.

jobs.title: Full stack developer
jobs.description:
We are looking for excellent software engineering talent to join our very early start-up. As an early team member you will have a chance to join at the very beginning and help define the company's engineering practices.

We will look at a wide range of experience for this role.

Our company culture and principles are here: https://unlikely.ai/principles/
